EDIT : if i give u the strip of coding that is making the errors can u change it and make it right?

item.title: How can i fix these errors
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Go back to the 20 errors, like mess up code again, then search through any code above it, ur missing a } most likely, because if u were missing a { it would have 100 errors. So just search really hard, hope it helps.

item.title: How can i fix these errors
item.dc:creator: @352scape 352scape
item.description:
@352scape wrote:

now i have these errors left lol

NPCHandler.java:1618: 'else' without 'if' else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55); ^ NPCHandler.java:1618: ']' expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55); ^ NPCHandler.java:1618: ';' expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55); ^ NPCHandler.java:1618: <identifier> expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55); ^ NPCHandler.java:1626: illegal start of type else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53); ^ NPCHandler.java:1626: ']' expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53); ^ NPCHandler.java:1626: ';' expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53); ^ NPCHandler.java:1626: <identifier> expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53); ^ NPCHandler.java:1634: illegal start of type else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54) ^ NPCHandler.java:1634: ']' expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54) ^ NPCHandler.java:1634: ';' expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54) ^ NPCHandler.java:1634: <identifier> expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54) ^ NPCHandler.java:1642: illegal start of type else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50); ^ NPCHandler.java:1642: ']' expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50); ^ NPCHandler.java:1642: ';' expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50); ^ NPCHandler.java:1642: <identifier> expected else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50); ^ 16 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

item.source: How can i fix these errors

item.title: How can i fix these errors
item.dc:creator: @352scape 352scape
item.description:
@352scape wrote:

this is the bit of coding that has the problems in it

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941); { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.sendMessage("You killed the green dragon? Can you handle the blue one?"); ppl.teleportToX = 2713; ppl.teleportToY = 4836; } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55); { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.sendMessage("The blue one is dead! Now for the red one!"); ppl.teleportToX = 2584; ppl.teleportToY = 4836; } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53); { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.sendMessage("Wow! I can't believe you beat the red one, the Black one won't be that easy!"); ppl.teleportToX = 2845; ppl.teleportToY = 4832; } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54); { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.sendMessage("Final Round: KBD! Kill it for your torso!"); ppl.teleportToX = 2269; ppl.teleportToY = 4843; } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50); { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.addItem(11268, 1); ppl.sendMessage("The minigame is complete! Heres your torso!"); ppl.teleportToX = 3224; ppl.teleportToY = 3510; }

here are the errors im getting

NPCHandler.java:1609: illegal start of type if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941); ^ NPCHandler.java:1609: ']' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941); ^ NPCHandler.java:1609: ';' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941); ^ NPCHandler.java:1609: <identifier> expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941); ^ NPCHandler.java:1617: illegal start of type if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55); ^ NPCHandler.java:1617: ']' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55); ^ NPCHandler.java:1617: ';' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55); ^ NPCHandler.java:1617: <identifier> expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55); ^ NPCHandler.java:1625: illegal start of type if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53); ^ NPCHandler.java:1625: ']' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53); ^ NPCHandler.java:1625: ';' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53); ^ NPCHandler.java:1625: <identifier> expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53); ^ NPCHandler.java:1633: illegal start of type if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54); ^ NPCHandler.java:1633: ']' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54); ^ NPCHandler.java:1633: ';' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54); ^ NPCHandler.java:1633: <identifier> expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54); ^ NPCHandler.java:1641: illegal start of type if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50); ^ NPCHandler.java:1641: ']' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50); ^ NPCHandler.java:1641: ';' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50); ^ NPCHandler.java:1641: <identifier> expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50); ^ 20 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

could someone please edit the first code and make it right please i beg you :p?

Read full topic
